entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Luwian
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$5.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [Free ~ $5.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

Application Description

Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images. The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel. Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography. Main Panel Features : Exposure control Focus + focus lock control Zoom White balance ISO Shutter speed Target grid Fullscreen Orientation indicator Current resolution indicator Torch mode: auto / on / off Flash mode: auto / on / off Camera switch menu Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse Shutter button Video recording button Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models) Shutter Timer Manual mode Auto mode Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models) Analog film mode Cinetone filter mode Classic filters and VFX Menu Luwian Raw Magic Lite All Raw Magic Lite Features : Import / Select / Delete Media EXIF info and details Photo edit crop resize Video edit crop resize (BETA) Photo / Video adjust Photo / Video general filters and VFX Photo / Video analog filters Photo / Video cinetone filters All Settings Features : Photo quality setup Camera preset access and video recording FPS setup Time-lapse speed 2x to 10x Turn on and off the main panel filter view The shutter timer is set up from three sec. to 15 sec. About section and link to support page

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Suika Game-Aladdin X
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • 2025Êò•„Ç§„Éº„Çπ„Çø„Éº„Çπ„Ç≠„É≥Ôºö$1.79 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $1.79]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

In-App Purchases

  • 2025Êò•„Åï„Åè„Çâ„Çπ„Ç≠„É≥Ôºö$0.49
  • Halloween PartyÔºö$1.79
  • „Éç„Ç™„É≥„Ç∑„ÉÜ„Ç£Ôºö$1.79
  • Â§èËâ≤„ÇØ„É™„Éº„É†„ÇΩ„Éº„ÉÄÔºö$1.19
  • 2025Êò•„ÅÑ„Å°„Åî„Çπ„Ç≠„É≥Ôºö$0.49
  • 2025Êò•„Éç„É¢„Éï„Ç£„É©„Çπ„Ç≠„É≥Ôºö$0.49
  • Wagashi WhispersÔºö$1.19
  • Summer holidayÔºö$1.19
  • 2025Êò•„Ç§„Éº„Çπ„Çø„Éº„Çπ„Ç≠„É≥Ôºö$0.99
  • Sunset beachÔºö$1.19

Application Description

‚óè Game overview Following on from the Aladdin X projector and Nintendo Switch versions, as the third step, we have now officially released a smartphone version. The rules are simple. It's a game where you combine two small fruits to make a bigger one and work towards making a watermelon. You must be careful that the fruits do not overflow from the box as you keep scoring points and aim to get a high score. When two fruits of the same type hit each other, the fruit type ‚Äúevolves.‚Äù Then, when you hit two watermelons against each other...!? The ranking is updated every day! Have fun aiming for the top ranking! ‚óè How to play the game 1. When fruits of the same type hit each other, they ‚Äúevolve‚Äù into the next size of fruit and the score increases. 2. Use your finger to move Poppy to the left and right and then take your finger off the screen to drop the fruit. You can also tap anywhere in the box to drop the fruit to that specific location. 3. The game ends if the fruit overflows from the box. ‚óè Notice Official information on the Suika Game is available here. Official Suika Game Website: https://suikagame.jp/

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • "Time"Ôºö$0.49
  • Donation IÔºö$0.99
  • Donation IIIÔºö$4.99
  • Donation IIÔºö$1.99

Application Description

Only You Are Here ‚Äî an atmospheric adventure with first-person horror elements. Take on the role of a person trapped inside their dream. This place is filled with a mix of memories and nightmares. To get out, you have to open a small door. Immerse yourself in the game's history, walk through many endings, and discover the key secret.

entry.title: The Greedy Cave
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Coupon of the Greedy CaveÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

In-App Purchases

  • Coupon of the Greedy CaveÔºö$0.99
  • Package8Ôºö$49.99
  • Package7Ôºö$29.99

Application Description

In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ... -------------------------------------------------------- In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters. Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave... Game Features ¬∑Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time! ¬∑Hundreds of monsters to defeat! ¬∑Hundreds of equipment to collect! ¬∑Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer! ¬∑Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore! Contact us cs.thegreedycave@avalongames.com https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. entry.title: LUCH: Photo Effects & Filters
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.29 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $0.59]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

LUCH Films is a modern app for giving images the effect of film photography. Try unique bokeh effects, light leaks, noise and dust effects, and original filters. 20+ HANDMADE FILTERS The application has over 20 different filters made by hand by a professional photographer. They are universal and made for various kinds of photos and colors, imitating the effects film KODAK and ILFORD. FILM FRAMES FOR INSTAGRAM STORY AND FEED We have adapted film frames for modern screen formats and added them to the application so that the warmth of film photography will always remain in our hearts and minds. DUST EFFECT Making a shabby photo is easy. You don't have to wait 20 years, you just have to choose one of 35 effects. LIGHT LEAKS You know these old light leaks shots that we loved to look at as children. We simulated the same light flashes in the LUCH FILMS. BOKEH EFFECT If you love bokeh as much as we do, then you should definitely love it. Choose from 35 bokeh and prism effects. NO ADS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES Take full control over your image, apply unique filters developed in collaboration with photographers. Create unique photos including new layers. Over 90 effects. The ability to apply noise and dust effects, light leaks, bokeh and prism effects to the image. You can choose the size of the image for a stream or story, which is ideal for Instagram or other social networks. Film frames are also included in the LUCH Films. Follow @luchfilmsapp on Instagram for inspiration from our community of users. We love hearing your ideas and feedback. Please email hello@vostokapp.ru or DM us on Instagram at @luchfilmsapp for questions or suggestions.

Application Description

**Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app for 7 years running** 97% of learners pass their Theory Test using nothing more than this 4 in 1 AWARD-WINNING app*! Revise with full confidence knowing you have EVERYTHING you need to pass your 2025 Theory Test first time, getting you 1 step closer to your full DVLA licence, or we‚Äôll give you your test fee back if you fail. Join the 18 MILLION+ learner drivers we‚Äôve helped prepare for their driving theory test. Suitable for: ‚Ä¢ Car Drivers in GB & NI ‚Ä¢ Motorcyclists in GB & NI ‚Ä¢ Trainee ADI's in GB & NI ‚Ä¢ HGV/LGV & PCV Drivers preparing to take Module 1a and 1b Tests in GB & NI DRIVING THEORY TEST 2025 Practise the latest Theory Test revision questions, answers and explanations, licensed directly from the DVSA (the people who set the official test). No other Theory Test app contains more revision questions! Sit UNLIMITED timed mock tests including the NEW DVSA video case studies. Car drivers can practise multiple-choice questions based on a short video...just like the real test. Keep a daily track of your progress so you know when you‚Äôre ready to sit the official Theory Test! FREE PASS GUARANTEE We‚Äôre so confident that our app will help you pass your Driving Theory Test, we will give you your ¬£23 test fee back if you fail after completing the revision plan in full. Available for learner car drivers and motorcyclists only. T&C‚Äôs apply**. LEARNER PLAN Struggling to know where to start with your Theory Test revision? Our structured Learner Plan ensures you a first time pass, guiding you through your revision from start to finish. LEADERBOARD Rev up your revision with our NEW weekly Leaderboard! Earn points for acing practice quizzes, passing Mock Tests and more. Revise for a prize as you make the most of your study sessions. SMART AI MODE Want a more tailored approach to revision? Smart AI Mode makes revising for your theory test more efficient and tracks your progress to help you concentrate on the areas where you need the most support. VOICEOVER English voiceover available for all Driving Theory Test revision questions PLUS The Highway Code...ideal for users with reading difficulties or dyslexia. HAZARD PERCEPTION TEST 85 interactive video clips, including all 34 DVSA CGI clips covering bad weather and night time driving, with built-in cheat detection just like in the official test. THE HIGHWAY CODE 2025 Edition Revise and refresh your knowledge of the latest UK Highway Code. Includes English voiceover. ROAD SIGNS 2025 Learn ALL the UK road signs with over 1,500 photos and descriptions. Optional LEARN TO DRIVE PRACTICAL CAR DRIVING CONTENT Includes: ‚Ä¢ 3 day trial access to over 250 virtual Practical Driving Lesson videos, to help you learn and understand the routines and manoeuvres that you could be asked to perform on your Driving Test ‚Ä¢ The top 10 reasons for failing ‚Ä¢ Learn how to banish test nerves and anxiety ‚Ä¢ A full mock driving test with examiner debrief ‚Ä¢ All the latest DVSA help and advice on the 'Ready to Pass?' campaign Helping you get one step closer to your full DVLA licence EXCLUSIVE BONUS CONTENT Access to exclusive offers and discounts! AWARDS: ‚Ä¢ Named Apple's No.1 paid iPhone app of 2024, 2023, 2022, 2021, 2020, 2019 & 2018 ‚Ä¢ As featured on the Gadget Show ‚Ä¢ Intelligent Instructor Product of the Year 2022, 2023 & 2024 ‚Ä¢ App of the Year, FirstCar Awards 2021 & 2019 ‚Ä¢ Winner of the Auto Express Theory Test App ‚Ä¢ DIA Driver and Rider Training Awards "Product of the Year" CONTACT US: support@drivingtestsuccess.com This app includes the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) revision question bank. The Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) has given permission for the reproduction of Crown copyright material. DVSA does not accept responsibility for the accuracy of the reproduction. Requires account creation to access content. *Based users who complete the Learner Plan in full **Pass Guarantee T&C‚Äôs apply. See www.drivingtestsuccess.com/app-pass-guarantee

entry.title: Whisper Notes - Speech To Text
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Whisper Notes: Offline speech-to-text powered by Whisper AI, perfect for capturing daily voice memos and meeting notes. The app runs completely offline to ensure your voice recordings and privacy never leave your device. No subscriptions, no in-app purchases, no ads‚Äîjust a simple one-time payment for lifetime access. ‚ñ† Features - Local voice recording & transcription - Import and transcribe audio/video files, all offline - Batch export or delete text and audio files - Supports export of timestamped transcript ‚ñ† Why we made this Sometimes I have a bizarre dream and want to record it when I wake up, but typing with sleepy eyes is tough. I needed a tool that could quickly capture and transcribe speech. When friends send messages that need long replies while I'm out walking or eating, I want to respond quickly without sending voice messages. ‚ñ† FAQ 1. Does it support real-time transcription during recording? Not currently‚Äîit records first, then transcribes when you're finished recording. 2. Is there a maximum transcription length? No limit in theory‚Äîyou can record several hours of audio. However, since transcription happens on your device, longer recordings will take more time to process. I've tested it with about 1 hour of audio and the transcription was accurate. 3. What's the transcription speed? It depends on your device. On my iPhone 15, the transcription speed is about 1:5, meaning 5 minutes of audio takes about 1 minute to transcribe. 4. Why is this a paid app without a free trial? We designed Whisper Notes to be completely offline to protect your privacy. Once you download and open the app, it never connects to the internet again. Offering a free trial would require in-app purchases, which need an internet connection‚Äîexactly what we're trying to avoid to keep your data secure. If you're not satisfied, just tap the settings button in the top right corner to find the "Request Refund" option. 5. Why doesn't it support AI summaries? Privacy is our top priority. We never upload your voice recordings or transcriptions to any AI services or cloud servers. You can always copy your transcriptions and use your preferred AI tool separately if you want summaries. 6. Why does transcription stop when I switch to another app? Because Whisper Notes uses on-device processing, it needs access to your phone's GPU to transcribe audio. Apple doesn't allow third-party apps to use the GPU when running in the background, so iOS automatically stops the transcription process when you leave the app. If this happens, simply return to the app and tap "Re-transcribe" to pick up where you left off. 7. What languages are supported? English, ‰∏≠Êñá, Deutsch, Espa√±ol, –†—É—Å—Å–∫–∏–π, ÌïúÍµ≠Ïñ¥, Fran√ßais, Êó•Êú¨Ë™û, Portugu√™s, T√ºrk√ße, Polski, Catal√†, Nederlands, Arabic, Svenska, Italiano, Bahasa Indonesia, Hindi, Suomi, Ti·∫øng Vi·ªát, Hebrew, –£–∫—Ä–∞—ó–Ω—Å—å–∫–∞, Greek, Bahasa Melayu, ƒåe≈°tina, Rom√¢nƒÉ, Dansk, Magyar, Tamil, Norsk, Thai, Urdu, Hrvatski, Bulgarian, Lietuvi≈≥, Latina, MƒÅori, Malayalam, Cymraeg, Slovenƒçina, Telugu, Persian, Latvie≈°u, Bengali, –°—Ä–ø—Å–∫–∏, Az…ôrbaycan, Sloven≈°ƒçina, Kannada, Eesti, Macedonian, Brezhoneg, Euskara, √çslenska, Armenian, Nepali, Mongolian, Bosanski, Kazakh, Shqip, Kiswahili, Galego, Marathi, Punjabi, Sinhala, Khmer, chiShona, Yor√πb√°, Soomaali, Afrikaans, Occitan, Georgian, Belarusian, Tajik, Sindhi, Gujarati, Amharic, Yiddish, Lao, Uzbek, F√∏royskt, Krey√≤l Ayisyen, Pashto, Turkmen, Nynorsk, Malti, Sanskrit, Luxembourgish, Myanmar, Tibetan, Tagalog, Malagasy, Assamese, Tatar, Hawaiian, Lingala, Hausa, Bashkir, Javanese, Sundanese ‚ñ† Contact support@whispernotes.app https://whispernotes.app
